title: Tetsuwan Birdy Decode: The Cipher (Birdy the Mighty: Decode OVA)
synopsis: Birdy uses her pin-up alter ego to help Tsutomu make a love connection with Sayaka, but everything goes horribly wrong when a Federation marionette is added to the equation!
